price: Kuleni na mjifurahishe kidogo tu. Hakika nyinyi ni wakosefu!
footnotes: Na makafiri wataambiwa: Kuleni na mjistareheshe kwa starehe isiyo baki muda mrefu, kwani hakika nyinyi ni wakosefu kwa kumshirikisha kwenu Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
